trans-unit.source: Represents the format to view an email message.
trans-unit.target: 表示若要檢視電子郵件訊息的格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternateView class to specify copies of an e-mail message in different formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternateView 類別來指定以不同格式的電子郵件訊息的複本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you send a message in HTML, you might also want provide a plain text version in case some of the recipients use e-mail readers that cannot display HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您在 HTML 中傳送一則訊息，您也可以提供純文字版使用電子郵件無法顯示 HTML 內容的讀取器部分收件者。

trans-unit.source: This class has two properties <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A> that are used to resolve URLs within the content of the email.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別有兩個屬性<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A>，用於電子郵件的內容中解析 Url。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> is a collection of <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>是一組<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource>物件。</xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource></xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>

trans-unit.source: When rendered, URLs within the e-mail's content are first matched against the URLs in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A> of each <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource> object in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> collection, and resolved.
trans-unit.target: 進行轉譯時，在電子郵件的內容中的 Url 第一次比對中的 Url<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A>每個<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource>物件存放至<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>集合，並已解決。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A> is used by the mail reader to resolve relative URLs within the body, and also to resolve relative <xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A> URLs, in the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A>使用 mail 讀取器來解析相對 Url 主體中，以及解析相對<xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A>Url，請在<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A>集合。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.LinkedResources%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource.ContentLink%2A></xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.BaseUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>與指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView> class call also be initialized by calling one of the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView>類別呼叫也初始化透過呼叫其中一個<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView.CreateAlternateViewFromString%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains the content for this view.
trans-unit.target: 包含此檢視的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: contentStream is .
trans-unit.target: contentStreamis .

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains the content for this alternate view.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個替代檢視內容的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤發生，例如磁碟錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified file handle, such as when access is Write or ReadWrite and the file handle is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 依指定的檔案控制代碼，例如當存取正在 Write 或 ReadWrite 的作業系統不允許要求的存取和檔案控制代碼設為唯讀存取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI to use for resolving relative URIs in the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用來解析相對 Uri 中的基底 URI <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 基底<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> of an email message using the content specified in a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>的電子郵件訊息使用<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>中指定的內容

trans-unit.source: The default media type is plain text and the default encoding is ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 預設媒體類型為純文字，並預設編碼為 ASCII。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> that contains the content of the email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含電子郵件訊息的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> object that represents an alternate view of an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"> </xref>物件，表示替代電子郵件訊息的檢視。

trans-unit.source: content is null.
trans-unit.target: content為 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> of an email message using the content specified in a <xref:System.String> and the specified MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>使用的內容中指定的電子郵件訊息的<xref:System.String>和指定的 MIME 媒體類型的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含這個附件的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref> that describes the data in `string`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"> </xref>描述中的資料`string`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> object that represents an alternate view of an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"> </xref>物件，表示替代電子郵件訊息的檢視。

trans-unit.source: content is null.
trans-unit.target: content為 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> of an email message using the content specified in a <xref:System.String>, the specified text encoding, and MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>使用的內容中指定的電子郵件訊息的<xref:System.String>、 指定的文字編碼，以及內容的 MIME 媒體類型。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含這個附件的內容。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding>.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The MIME media type of the content.
trans-unit.target: MIME 媒體類型的內容。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> object that represents an alternate view of an email message.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"> </xref>物件，表示替代電子郵件訊息的檢視。

trans-unit.source: content is null.
trans-unit.target: content為 null。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView>參考。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AlternateView>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of embedded resources referred to by this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得此附件所參考的內嵌資源的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"></xref> object that stores the collection of linked resources to be sent as part of an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResourceCollection"> </xref>儲存作為電子郵件訊息的一部分傳送連結的資源集合的物件。
